Sentencas: A novel family of metal oxides of chemical formula Ba2Ca(1-x -y)M(x+z)Nb(1-z+ y)O6-delta (M = Mn, Fe and Co) was developed as mixed ion and electronic conductors (MIECs) for application in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties

Sentencas: Investigated samples were synthesized by a ceramic method at 1400 degrees C in air and characterized using powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD), selected area electron diffraction (SAED), thermo-gravimetric analysis (TGA), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX), dilatometry, chemical titration and electrochemical ac impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties

Sentencas: The Rietveld analysis of PXRD and SAED support the formation of ordered double perovskite-type structure with space group Fm3m and chemical stability in 5000 ppm H2S/H-2 at 600 degrees C. Iodometric titration shows the valences of Mn and Co were 2+ and 3+, while Fe shows 3+ and 4+ states.
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties

Sentencas: SEM reveals that the porosity of the samples is highly affected by dopants.
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients (TEC) of the asprepared samples are very comparable to the oxide conducting Y-doped ZrO2-Ba2Ca0.79Co0.5Nb0.71O6-delta exhibits the total conductivity of 3.7 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 816 inverted perpendicular C in air.
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties

Sentencas: The trend in the conductivity of Ba2Ca(1-x -y)M(x+z)Nb(1-z+y)O6-delta could be correlated to the reduction of the dopants and the subsequent loss of oxide ions at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Effect of substitution of B-sites by Mn, Fe and Co in double perovskite-type Ba3CaNb2O9 on structure and electrical properties
